subject: Re: Beauty with Bonnie - Invitation design
preview: Hi Heath,  Fantastic, thank you so much for your help!  Speak soon,  Tanja

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Fantastic, thank you so much for your help!

Speak soon,

Tanja

Hi Tanja,

Ok sure, that's great.

I have attached two variations for you to pick from.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath,

No further changes from Bonnie.

If you could just include a white box at the bottom of the invite, so that the logos are being displayed against a white background - then we're ready to go!

Cheers,
Tanja

Hi Heath,

Amazing, I like the version without the black background. I've just sent it to Bonnie for approval, so will let you know asap.

Once more thing Trish just raised was that we will need a white box at the bottom to provide white background for the logos.

But please hold off on this until I hear back from Bonnie in case this involves any further changes.

Speak soon,
Tanja

Hi Tanja,

Ok sure, please see attached the two revised versions.

I made the middle photos taller so we could decrease the RSVP box a little. It is important that it stands out though.

Let me know which one you prefer? Thanks,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath,

The invite looks great, I love the new layout!

Can you please make the following changes:

· Please make the first blurb fully justified

· Increase of the title size is great, but can you please provide one option with black background and one without?

· Any chance we could decrease the size of the RSVP box a little? Currently it stands out a little too much I think

If you could send through a final draft by 12pm today, that would be fabulous!

Thanks so much,

Tanja

Hi Tanja,

Ok sure, we took you up on the opportunity to tweak the layout etc. it helped us squeeze more images in and also increase the title size.

Please see attached and let me know what you think now?

Thanks,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

Hi Heath,

So sorry for the hassle, but did you have time to update the invite at all?

I would love to send it out tomorrow.

Cheers,

Tanja

Hi Heath,

Thank you for working on this so quickly, I really appreciate it!

Please make the following changes:

· Please increase font size for heading 'Beauty with Bonnie - Kiss Goodbye to MS Exclusive'

· Change 'MC Bonnie G' to Bonnie Gillies

· Please also change image of Bonnie to the attached

· Please try to emphasise the personalised nature of the workshop by using one of the attached images where Bonnie is applying make-up

· Feel free to change background and layout to be able to use the images

Cheers,

Tanja

Hi Tanya, 

Ok sure, here is a link to the invite: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4dgiefc13nfvs1g/Beauty-with-Bonnie-2020-Invite.jpg?dl=0

We kept a similar layout and tweaked to allow for the image variety. We also used a photo from the hotels website as the background.

Let me know what you think?
I forgot to attach the previous invite, please see attached now.

attachments.filename: Kiss Goodbye to MS Launch Breakfast Invite.png

full_threads.body:
Hi Wolf IQ team,

Can you please assist with the invitation design of our upcoming event?

We're after a beautiful A5 invite, similar layout/vibe to our launch event invite (attached). I've attached a couple of images for you to play with and please also use our font 'Yorkshire Brush Script' and include the MS Research Australia and KGTMS logo.

We are on a tight deadline to get those invites out, so I would appreciate if you could get back to me with a first draft asap.

Please find all details below.


Thanks so much,

Tanja




You're invited!
Name: Beauty with Bonnie - Kiss Goodbye to MS Exclusive

Blurb:
Join our Kiss Goodbye to MS Ambassador and makeup artist Bonnie Gillies (aka Oz Beauty Expert) for this hands-on beauty workshop. This intimate session will be very interactive and personalised, and is a great chance to hang out with your fellow Kiss Goodbye to MS supporters!

Date: Saturday 22nd February
Time: 9:50am for a 10am start, event concludes by 12pm
Dress: A touch of red
Location: The Hughenden Boutique Hotel
14 Queen St, Woollahra NSW 2025
Parking: We recommend catching public transport or an Uber/Taxi to the venue

Please RSVP to Shannen
schia@msra.org.au by Friday 14th Feb
Tanja Voss
Community Fundraising Manager - Kiss Goodbye to MS
MS Research Australia
02 8413 7919 • 1300 356 467
tvoss@msra.org.au• www.msra.org.au

Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

If you have received this message in error, please notify the sender immediately and delete this message.
